org.microbean.settings

Class Setting.Literal

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.enterprise.util.AnnotationLiteral<Setting>
      • org.microbean.settings.Setting.Literal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Annotation, Setting
    Enclosing class:
    Setting

    public static final class Setting.Literal
extends AnnotationLiteral<Setting>
implements Setting
    An AnnotationLiteral that implements the Setting interface/annotation.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    Setting, Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String defaultValue()
      The default value for the setting.
      String name()
      The setting name.
      boolean required()
      Whether a value for the setting must be present; it is illegal to set this to true and set the defaultValue element to a value other than Setting.UNSET

    • Constructor Detail

      • Literal

        public Literal(String name,
               String defaultValue,
               boolean required)
        Creates a new Setting.Literal.
        Parameters:
        name - the value for the name element; may be null in which case Setting.UNSET will be used instead
        defaultValue - the value for the defaultValue element; may be null in which case Setting.UNSET will be used instead
        required - the value for the required element

    • Method Detail

      • name

        public final String name()
        The setting name.
        Returns:
        the setting name; never null but possibly Setting.UNSET

      • defaultValue

        public final String defaultValue()
        The default value for the setting.
        Returns:
        the default value; never null but possibly Setting.UNSET

      • required

        public final boolean required()
        Whether a value for the setting must be present; it is illegal to set this to true and set the defaultValue element to a value other than Setting.UNSET
        Returns:
        whether a value for the setting must be present
